3.0 inch colorful display, good viewing experience compared with other 2.4 inch products

body.description: this nostalgic game console has 500 built-in games, the old school games will remind you of the happy gaming childhood. It has 1020 mAh rechargeable li-battery, can last for 3-5 hours. The mini game console has a 3.0 inch color display, compared with other products with 2.4 inch, bigger screen can offer a good view and protects the sight. the volume controller can adjust the sound as you like. the retro handheld support 1 or 2 players mode, there is one gamepad packed with it, you can use the game console as player 1, and use the gamepad for player 2. the mini game player support connect to TV ( TV that has AV port) Package includes: game console *1pc, gamepad *1pc, AV cable *1pc, charging cord *1pc, user manual*4pc . A great gift for family and friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the money/under $20
reviews.reviewText: For under $20 not bad all all. The music for super mario bros plays fast but the game plays fine,and the fan works really good also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The little plastic dot in the middle of the fan fell off almost immediately. It was easy to glue back in place, but I figured it was worth mentioning.Next, I highly doubt all of these games have been authorized. I feel sort of weird playing them because I think everything might not be on the up and up.There are tons and tons of games – old and new. Graphics are comparable to the hand held systems from a few decades ago, but quite acceptable. The fan is a fun addition, too.Navigation isn’t the greatest, but it is decent. Figuring out how to play each game is sometimes a challenge, too, but the multiplayer options are nice.The physical build seems to be sturdy enough, and battery charge lasts a while.
